group_1.textRight: …I tried to do the same thing a while back…

group_1.textLeft: Did you throw away your doujinshi?

group_1.textRight: …No, they were original stories I wrote@with my own worldbuilding…
But n-now's not the time for talking about that!
I shouldn't start rambling about myself every chance@I get…

group_1.textLeft: I don't mind, though…

group_1.textRight: …A-anyway, if you toss your doujinshi and games,@you're definitely gonna regret it later.
I don't…want you to get rid of your stuff…

group_1.textLeft: Rui…

group_1.textRight: …But I don't want to disrespect your wishes either,@so…
I know this is kinda selfish of me,@but you should wait a bit before you decide…
So, while you hang onto what you like…
Why don't we think a little harder together…
...about a way for you to control it in public…?

group_1.textLeft: …Understood.
But-but how in the world am I supposed to@do that…?

group_1.textRight: …For starters, what kinds of legs are you into?

group_1.textLeft: Um, uh… It's kinda hard to put into words…

group_1.textRight: Is that so…
…Okay, let's go somewhere busy to figure out@what your type is.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?!

group_1.textRight: …And then…maybe we can figure out a way@to control it.

group_1.textLeft: S-so many people, so many legs…!
I-I feel like I'm gonna faint…

group_1.textRight: …Y-you'll be okay. Take a deep breath and relax.

group_1.textLeft: *Inhale*@*Exhale*…

group_1.textRight: …Now let's start the ratings.
…How about that person?

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh*…@Weally pwetty…

group_1.textRight: …Don't stare too much, okay?@You're gonna get caught otherwise…

group_1.textLeft: *Gasp*!@I don't wanna go to jail!

group_1.textRight: Alright, next up…

group_1.textLeft: Those sure are legs.

group_1.textRight: …What?

group_1.textLeft: He has legs. That's all I've got to say.

group_1.textRight: (I guess that means…she doesn't feel anything…)

group_1.textLeft: Gyah!

group_1.textRight: …What's wrong?

group_1.textLeft: Hairy legs in shorts really gross me out…!

group_1.textRight: (So there are no-gos in leg fetishism too…@Things she dislikes…)

group_1.textLeft: Legs that have changed over the years feel precious,@just like the years that've gone by.
Besides,@thinking about what her legs used to be like…

group_1.textRight: (…Her preference range is wild.)
…Hey, how about that girl?

group_1.textLeft: (That girl…wait WHAT?!)

group_1.textRight: (Crap, those people are…)
Nemu and her friend…

group_1.textLeft: (What do I do, what do I do?!)
(Lady Nemu and I are enemies now…)
(I don't wanna fight in front of Rui,@since she doesn't know about Magical Girls…)
(And fighting without Lady San would endanger@Rui and everyone around us…)
(Also…)
You mentioned Lady Nemu's name earlier.
Can-can I ask how you know her?

group_1.textRight: Huh?! Well, um…
(We're both in the Kamihama Magia Union,@so we've seen each other's faces around.)
(If I suddenly went and said…@"I'm actually a Magical Girl",)
(even Miyuri would be put off by that,@wouldn't she…?)
(Oh yeah… Seira said she made a movie@with them before.)
(I feel like she mentioned something about that…)
Uh, she's a…friend of a friend, I guess.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I see!

group_1.textRight: …Anyway, don't those two seem like they're in trouble…?

group_1.textLeft: They do, they do…@Is her wheelchair stuck?

group_1.textRight: W-we've gotta help them…!

group_1.textLeft: Um…

group_1.textRight: Huh…? Y-you're not coming?

group_1.textLeft: (I can't let Rui's clean conscience get in the way of…)
B-b-b…be right there…!
